page.title: 04BLAGDON VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: We have ninety five pupils in Blagdon school this year. We enjoy all sorts of sports and outdoor activities, like natural history. We built a small wildlife area with a pond in the school grounds and we have an outdoor swimming pool. We usually start the day with assembly at nine o'clock, but sometimes we have assembly at 10.20a.m. We have a games lesson on Friday or Thursday at 2.40p.m. For winter games we play hockey and basketball. In the summer we play rounders or minor games. In the winter we have a lesson on the large apparatus. In the summer we go swimming in our school pool. We have three cloak rooms,one library, a school house, the Headmaster's office and four stock rooms. We have a small playing field where we play rounders, football or do our sports.
